home.heroDescription: Create beautiful digital menus for your restaurant. Generate QR codes, customize themes, and manage your menu items all in one place.
home.featuresDescription: Everything you need to create and manage digital menus for your restaurant
home.menuManagementDesc: Easily add, edit, and delete menu items with a user-friendly interface
home.themeSelectionDesc: Choose from a variety of pre-designed themes to match your brand
home.qrCodeGenerationDesc: Generate QR codes that link directly to your digital menu
home.howItWorksDesc: Get your digital menu up and running in minutes with our simple three-step process.
home.step1Desc: Add your menu items with descriptions, prices, and images through our intuitive dashboard.
home.step2Desc: Choose a theme that matches your restaurant's brand and customize colors and layout.
home.step3Desc: Generate a QR code, print it, and place it on your tables for customers to scan.
home.testimonialsDesc: See what restaurant owners are saying about MenuMaster
home.contactSubTitle: Got a technical issue? Want to send feedback about a beta feature? Need details about our Business plan? Let us know.
home.pricingDesc: Choose the plan that works best for your restaurant
home.starterDesc: Perfect for small cafes and food trucks

questions.question: I already have menus made of paper, why is your digital menu better?
questions.answer: Our digital QR code menu is contactless and it’s always 'on the table'. Guests don’t have to wait for the waiter to bring them a menu or search for the menu on their own. The less waiting time and actions needed to make an order, the more orders will be made. Paper menus can’t be edited, there is no way to create promotions and discounts quickly. To maintain the relevance and presentable look of a paper menu, it has to be reprinted from time to time.

questions.question: I already have a QR code menu with a PDF file, how is your digital menu different from this?
questions.answer: The PDF file is not interactive. It inherits all the disadvantages of a paper menu. Your QR code menu looks like a text based price list, and not like a modern store page that is made to increase your sales. You cannot add photos and descriptions for every item to the PDF menu, it will immediately become huge and unreadable. When you scan QR code of a PDF menu, you need to download it to your phone, which can be problematic with low Internet connection speed or if your guests just doesn't like to download anything to their phones. PDF menus, once again, cannot be quickly edited. You have a new type of cheesecake? Now you have to redo the entire PDF and re-upload it to your.

questions.question: Do I have to call or to message you every time when I want to change something at my QR code menu?
questions.answer: No, you don’t have to. You are able to edit your QR code menu whenever you want to. We have designed an administrator interface that makes it easy to edit your menu from both desktop and mobile devices. We can also give your employees an access to your digital menu so that they were able to keep it up to date on their own, without any action from you.

questions.question: Is it possible to try your digital menu for free first?
questions.answer: Of course. You can try our digital menu service first, and then decide, does it suits your business or not. To try it you don’t need to add your credit card info or pay for a subscription. Our QR code menu is free of charge for a full month. All you need to do is to create an account and we will automatically add a free month for you.

questions.question: I want to change the name of my restaurant, cafe or bar, but I don’t want to print new QR codes for the menu, what should I do?
questions.answer: Your old QR codes will work if you change the name of your restaurant, cafe or bar. Or if you will change anything else in your digital menu. Even the link, leading to your digital menu, can be changed at any time, and the old QR code will still work.

themes.themeDesc: Choose a theme for your digital menu. The selected theme will be applied to your public menu page.
themes.modernDesc: A clean, modern design with a focus on readability

qrCode.qrCodeDesc: Generate a QR code for your digital menu. Customers can scan this code to view your menu on their devices.
qrCode.menuUrlDesc: This is the URL that will be encoded in the QR code
qrCode.qrCodePreviewDesc: Scan this code to view your digital menu
qrCode.printOptionsDesc: Choose how you want to display your QR code
qrCode.tableTentDesc: A double-sided tent card that sits on tables. Includes your QR code and instructions for customers.
qrCode.posterDesc: A larger poster to display at the entrance or on walls. Includes your QR code and restaurant branding.
qrCode.stickerDesc: Round stickers that can be placed on tables, windows, or other surfaces. Includes your QR code.
